title: Mark Cavendish Could Begin His Tour de France Record Bid with Colombia Season-Opener
content:
The Manxman is aiming to become the outright record holder of Tour de France stage wins and needs just one more win this summer to take it.

Read the full article at Mark Cavendish Could Begin His Tour de France Record Bid with Colombia Season-Opener on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
